answers.answer: You should go checked just in case. To be on the safe side... Frequent urination is another sign... And feeling really fatigued... Not being yourself.. But I would go get checked and let them know about the numbness you having been having... Good luck and god bless :)

question: Okay. Well I'm hungry a lot but I have bad diarrhea. My vision has been a little weird. I pee a lot and drink a good bit. But my foot sometimes goes super numb to the point where I can't feel it and if I try to stand I fall if I put pressure on it because I can't feel it at all. Someone reply asap
title: Could I have diabetes  reply ASAP please
